オプション1: "O-oh. Nice gear you’ve got there, haha."
Trapezoid Man said, eyeing the burning stick in Star Man’s hand.

"Hey. I brought some acorns.
Also, I’d like to talk—mind if I bring the kids over?"
"Well then... first, let me give you this..."

Star Man took some acorns from his bag and placed them near Trapezoid Man.
Then, he went to his room.
